actor_type.description: Type of actor. Ex: 'APT', 'eCrime', 'Hacktivist', 'Insider Threat', 'Nation-State', 'Unknown', 'Other', etc. Select 'None' for no preference.

cloud_type.description: Your cloud type for CrowdStrike. Ex: 'autodiscover', 'us-1', 'us-2', 'eu-1', 'us-gov-1'.

cron.description: Cron string for scheduling the ingest of your input

sort.description: Order fields in ascending or descending order. Ex: 'created_date|asc', 'created_date|desc'.

target_industries.description: Industries targeted by the actor. Ex: 'Financial', 'Healthcare', 'Energy', 'Government', 'Manufacturing', 'Technology', etc. Select 'None' for no preference.

key.description: The key to add to the record

value.description: The value to add to the record

email.description: Email address to use for authenticating with Google Cloud.

actions.description: Filter by specific actions. Use wildcards for broader matches (e.g., repo.*)

actor.description: Filter by the username that initiated the action

country.description: Filter by actor's country code (e.g., US)

created_after.description: Only return audit log entries after this RFC3339 formatted time stamp

enterprise.description: Your GitHub enterprise slug or ID

include.description: Event types to include. web: Gets all web (non-git) events. git: Gets git events. all: Gets both.

user.description: Filter by the username that was affected by the action

compression.description: Compression format of the S3 objects.

format.description: File format of the S3 objects.

partition_format.description: Role ARN to assume when reading from S3.

prefix.description: Prefix of the S3 object keys to read.

record_location.description: Specifies the partition format of your S3 bucket. Select the option that matches how your data is currently organized in S3. This ensures that the system can correctly navigate your bucket structure. Options include Hive-compatible format ('year=2024/month=01/day=01') commonly used in data lake setups, and simple date format ('2024/01/01') for basic chronological organization.

role_arn.description: Location of the record in the JSON object. This can be ignored if the record is not in JSON format.

correlation_id.description: The correlation ID of the log

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID of the Azure subscription

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID of the Azure AD application

key.description: The key to add to the record

value.description: The value to add to the record

key.description: The key to drop from the record
The key to drop from the record

value.description: The value to drop to check for equality with the record's value

key.description: The key which values should be checked

value.description: The value to compare with the record's value

NewKey.description: The new key to duplicate the value to

key.description: The key to duplicate from the record

delimiter.description: The delimiter to use when flattening for example flattening an array of assets: _ would result in assets_0, assets_1
The delimiter to use when flattening for example flattening an array of assets: _ would result in assets_0, assets_1

key.description: The key to store the JQ query result under. If this is not provided the output will be the result of the JQ query.

query.description: The JQ query to apply to the record

new_key.description: The key to store the result of the multiplication

x-enum-comments.ConditionOperatorNor: None of the conditions should be true
x-enum-comments.ConditionOperatorOr: At least one condition must be true
x-enum-comments.ConditionOperatorXor: Exactly one condition should be true

description.description: The user set Description of the secret

name.description: The user set Name of the secret

organization_id.description: The OrganizationID the secret belongs to

value.description: The value of the secret. This will never be returned to the client but can be used to set new values when used in a request payload.

key.description: The key to mutate the type of

type.description: The new type of the key

value_to_set.description: The value to set if the key and value match

new_key.description: The new key to rename to
The new key to rename to

product_id.description: ProductID is the ID of the product to subscribe to

routesV2.SecretResponse.description: A secret object without sensitive data

key.description: The key to store the timestamp in

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
